Name: Other by ABL
Description: Other by ABL by A Beautiful Life Brands is a fragrance for women and men. "This Perfume Fights Fascism! First it'sthem, next it'sYOU! Standing up for what you believe in takes dedication - and involves long hours and close quarters. There's no reason you can't smell great on the barricades and in the corridors of power. We can help! IntroducingOTHER by ABL, a universal scent - made in solidarity with people of all genders, creeds, colors, and heritage. Notes of strong coffee, sweet honey, spicy cardamom, lush brown suede, and fragrant cannabis forge a unique and hopeful accord. Specially priced for challenging times! OTHER by ABL was created in a spirit of diversity and inclusiveness, in response to concerns many Americans are sharing about our freedoms, and our future." - a note from the brand.

Name: Mermaid's Kiss
Description: Mermaid's Kiss by A Beautiful Life Brands is a Aromatic Aquatic fragrance for women. "Mermaid's Kiss Perfumesmells of fresh ocean air, island fruits, lush native flora, and the warmth of your skin in the sun. Close your eyes and you can feel the salty spray as the sea crashes on the rocks. With notes of Jamaican lime, juicy pineapple, French cypress, pink lotus, bamboo, lily, and bay rum. Exotic and intoxicating!" - a note from the brand.

Name: Fawn
Description: Fawn by A Beautiful Life Brands is a Aromatic Green fragrance for women and men. "There’s something so magical about a walk in the woods; a craggy trail over twisted roots, mossy stones along a silvery brook, shafts of golden sun broken by the lush green boughs overhead. Then the trees part into a clearing, and in the tall grass of the meadow – a Fawn. Fawn by ABL is a fresh, green EDP with a toasty sweet finish. Notes of dandelion, lemongrass, and marshmallow combine to create something surprising and delightful." - a note from the brand.

Name: NO by ABL
Description: NO by ABL by A Beautiful Life Brands is a fragrance for women. "NO by ABL is a heady Eau de Parfum blend of overripe fruits, lush wildflowers, pink peppercorn, and sensual patchouli. Utterly feminine. Utterly Strong. NO by ABL EDP. Say NO to rape, rape culture, and all forms of sexual violence. " - a note from the brand.

Name: PoP by ABL
Description: PoP by ABL by A Beautiful Life Brands is a fragrance for women and men. "PoP by ABL is a vibrant and romantic Eau de Parfum. Each spritz reveals an explosion of effervescent goodness that’s totally wearable! PoP even has a super cool Pop Art comic label! Notes of warm cherry blossom, juicy white peach, and lively ginger - with just a touch of cleansing clary sage - make PoP by ABL a fresh, fun, & fizzy EDP!" - a note from the brand.

Name: I Heart Unicorns
Description: I Heart Unicorns by A Beautiful Life Brands is a fragrance for women. "I Heart Unicorns is an ode to your teenage years, inspired by myth and the power of belief - Where Barbie dolls and blacklight posters co-existed in your boudoir. Bright notes of Lemon, Peppermint, and Pomegranate are grounded by a fresh, earthy base. Mystery swirls and surrounds with Nag Champaand Frankincense. It's all bubblegum, bridles, and girly fantasy." - a note from the brand.

Name: ABL No. 6
Description: ABL No. 6 by A Beautiful Life Brands is a fragrance for women and men. "A fresh, pretty, and totally original fragrance, perfect for any season. Orchard fruits, pear and fig, blend beautifully with sweet honeysuckle, exotic osmanthus, and fragrant lilac. Deepened by a touch of sandalwood." - a note from the brand.

Name: Black Rose
Description: Black Rose by A Beautiful Life Brands is a fragrance for women. "A thoroughly modern unisex rose fragrance, sensual and sophisticated. Bulgarian rose is amplified and framed by hints of leather, amber, and musk. Black Rose is an enchanting way to rediscover the beauty and elegance of roses." - a note from the brand.

Name: Composition by ABL
Description: Composition by ABL by A Beautiful Life Brands is a fragrance for women and men. "Back-to-school is a time bursting with expectation and new romantic possibility. Summer is over, its bittersweet kiss good-bye faintly lingers as you experience the promise that the changing seasons bring. Composition by ABL is an ode to that feeling of anticipation – a clean, modern, yet sensual accord for men and women. Notes of flinty graphite, bleached white paper, lush green apple, and soft grey woolens will come alive with the warmth of your skin, in a cozy sweater, on a chilly autumn day, as the leaves turn…" - a note from the brand.

Name: Crush'd
Description: Crush'd by A Beautiful Life Brands is a fragrance for women and men. "A warm, dreamy blend of Blood Orange, Vanilla, Tonka Bean, Ylang Ylang, and Sandalwood. Spicy and seductive, like a sexy creamsicle - this one's Shannon's fave!" - a note from the brand.

Name: Amber Queen
Description: Amber Queen by A Dozen Roses is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women.Amber Queenwas launched in 2012. The nose behind this fragrance is Lynn Emmolo. Top notes are Apricot, Clementine and Ginger; middle notes are Damask Rose and Rose; base note is Amber.

Name: Electron
Top Notes: The scent is linear,weak,the ingredients are extremely commercial,after trying it it's not worth the money 💰,the coffee scent is not there.
Description: Electron by A Dozen Roses is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women.Electronwas launched in 2012. The nose behind this fragrance is Lynn Emmolo. Electron is inspired by the Electric Pink Rose and named ELECTRON. The fragrance is bright, fresh and clean. "A shock to the senses. ELECTRON is a stunning combination of Electric Pink Rose blended with a jolt of green tea, violet leaves and cattalyea orchid then supercharged with neon musk, and A Dozen Roses' signature rose absolute." ADR Press Release ELECTRON is available exclusively at Neiman Marcus and Bergdorf Goodman on February 12th. It retails for $95 (3.4 fl. oz.).

Name: Casablanca
Description: Casablanca by A la Façon Londonis a fragrance for men.Casablancawas launched in 1974.

Name: Sucre Blanc
Description: Sucre Blanc by A Beautiful Life Brands is a fragrance for women and men. "A delicious and warm accord - milk sugar, vanilla and seductive musk meld with a touch of cassia (cinnamon) and white pepper." - a note from the brand.

Name: Angel Face
Description: Angel Face by A Dozen Roses is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women.Angel Facewas launched in 2013. The nose behind this fragrance is Lynn Emmolo. Top notes are Black Currant and Apple; middle notes are Rose, Violet, Peony, Lilac and Jasmine; base notes are Vetiver, Patchouli and Tonka Bean. Angel Face is the newest rose in the bouquet of A Dozen Roses. The fragrance was inspired by the Angel Face rose, a tea rose hybrid known for its striking lavender-blue colored blossoms and intense citrus-fruity aroma. Angel Face by A Dozen Roses is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. This is anew fragrance. Angel Face was launched in 2013. The fragrance is an Eau de Parfum available in 100 ml/3.4 oz. bottles. Top notes are black currant and apple; middle notes are peony, violet, jasmine, lilac and the signature A Dozen Roses rose absolute; base notes are patchouli, roasted tonka bean and vetiver.

Name: Gold Rush
Base Notes: I've waited to review it until i tested it more times. When i first smelled the tester it felt exrremelly resinous and woody. Woody like a wood burning in the fireplace. Interesting but definitely not suitable for a perfume in my perception and definitely not appealing at all. A few hours...
Description: Gold Rush by A Dozen Roses is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women.Gold Rushwas launched in 2011. The nose behind this fragrance is Lynn Emmolo. "All the glisters is not gold" William Shakespeare The yellow color is quite exotic in the world of roses as it attracts attention with a so far yet to be experienced combination of olfactive impressions. A teasing sour-sweet blackberry dipped in chocolate invites you to explore all the layers of this sweet woody-floral fragrance poured with golden spicy dust. This fragrance is not about dewy morning rose, its sweet and spicy character works better for a romantic night.

Name: Iced White
Description: Iced White by A Dozen Roses is a Floral fragrance for women.Iced Whitewas launched in 2011. The nose behind this fragrance is Lynn Emmolo. middle notes are Peony, Rose, Osmanthus and Primrose; base notes are Musk and Vanille. "All that we see or seem is but a dream within a dream" Edgar Allen Poe Iced White is a harmonious chorus of pure white blooms - the rose being one of them. It's now innocent and fragile, hidden in the cool shade of a green garden. The most discreet of all three, it doesn't explore new horizons, it just reveals the astonishing beauty of white flowers in a very elegant way.

Name: Moonlight Cypress
Description: Moonlight Cypress by A La Lune is a Aromatic fragrance for women and men.Moonlight Cypresswas launched in 2021. Top notes are Juniper and Sage; middle notes are Cade oil and Cypriol Oil or Nagarmotha; base notes are Juniper and White Musk. Moonlight Cypress- Incense of Tibetan Ritual The sacred lake is under the blessing of moonlight, surrounded by the snow-capped mountains where Sabina Przewalskii is found. Immersed in the reverence of Moonlight Cypress with the burning incense of “Weisang” ritual and pure air of Tibet. At night, every mountain, every river is imbued with divinity. Strolling with A La Lune to the sacred lake beneath the glaciers, it mirrors the pines, cypresses and the blooming wildflowers. Moonlight Cypress Eau de Toilette, the memory of moonlight, starts a pilgrimage to another world.

Name: Vrai Vert
Top Notes: Portobello Road is a fantastic market... what the notes and colours used in this campaign have to do with it I'd love to know as a resident. Could have been so easy to go around the area and pick house or door colours and smells that would TRULY capture this unique part of London......
Description: Vrai Vert by A Beautiful Life Brands is a fragrance for women and men. "A crisp, green, alluring accord of cool cucumber, exotic narcissus, spicy bergamot and coriander, with a touch of fragrant lavender. Evokes long afternoons in a secret garden!" - a note from the brand.

Name: Shakespeare in Love
Description: Shakespeare in Love by A Dozen Roses is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women.Shakespeare in Lovewas launched in 2011. The nose behind this fragrance is Lynn Emmolo. Top note is Pear; middle notes are Rose, Gardenia and Jasmine; base notes are Vanille and Woodsy Notes. "And what love can do that dares love attempt" William Shakespeare Shakespeare in Love is a red rose composition and the most powerful of all three. The sweet freshness of juicy pear is generously sprinkled over the petals folded in the heart. They open up passionately soon after the first fragrant wave will be gone, shaking off cheerful sweet drops of the initial impression. The pear is still there, hidden in blooms while its cool moisture balances the edgy note of jasmine. The rose shines brightly and its whisper turns into a powerful monologue.

Name: Composition by ABL
Description: Composition by ABL by A Beautiful Life Brands is a fragrance for women and men. "Back-to-school is a time bursting with expectation and new romantic possibility. Summer is over, its bittersweet kiss good-bye faintly lingers as you experience the promise that the changing seasons bring. Composition by ABL is an ode to that feeling of anticipation – a clean, modern, yet sensual accord for men and women. Notes of flinty graphite, bleached white paper, lush green apple, and soft grey woolens will come alive with the warmth of your skin, in a cozy sweater, on a chilly autumn day, as the leaves turn…" - a note from the brand.
